title: #711 - Mick Mahan
description:
Mick Mahan, a bass player who has performed live and on albums with Pat Benatar, Prince, and Sheryl Crow among many others, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt live in studio.

Mick is also the owner of Parma Pizzeria Napoletana, an authentic pizzeria in Thousand Oaks, CA. (A suburb of Los Angeles)

This podcast is brought to you by:

Upstart.com - The revolutionary new lending platform that knows you're more than just a credit score. Go to www.upstart.com/church to see how low your rate is. Checking your rate doesn't affect your credit score.
